title: What were the Wimbledon results?
description: Top seed Jannik Sinner and seven-time champion Novak Djokovic cruised through their second-round matches Thursday at Wimbledon, while fourth seed Jack Draper fell against 2014 US Open champion Marin Cilic.  View Thursday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores. html:
Wimbledon

Sinner cruises, Draper falls to Cilic

July 03, 2025

Ezra Shaw/Getty Images

Wimbledon main-draw action runs until 13 July. By ATP Staff

Top seed Jannik Sinner and seven-time champion Novak Djokovic cruised through their second-round matches Thursday at Wimbledon, while fourth seed Jack Draper fell against 2014 US Open champion Marin Cilic. 

View Thursday's featured results from the All England Club below and click here to see all scores.

Centre Court
[6] Novak Djokovic (SRB) def. Daniel Evans (GBR) 6-3, 6-2, 6-0
[8] Iga Swiatek (POL) def. Caty McNally (USA) 5-7, 6-2, 6-1
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) def. Aleksandar Vukic (AUS) 6-1, 6-1, 6-3

No. 1 Court
[7] Mirra Andreeva def. Lucia Bronzetti (ITA) 6-1, 7-6(4)
[11] Elena Rybakina [KAZ] def. Maria Sakkari (GRE) 6-3, 6-1
Marin Cilic [CRO] def. [4] Jack Draper (GBR) 6-4, 6-3, 1-6, 6-4

Read More from Wimbledon:
Draper: Most players don't bully me, Cilic did
Shelton unable to convert 3 MPs before play suspended
Munar converts 11th MP in rollercoaster
